location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blue ink on paperDimensions: 220 x 155 mm.Foliation: The map is inserted into a folio, the foliation is in the top right hand corner of the hosting folio with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Shows the Qatar peninsula with a blue pecked line indicating the Southern border according to Colonel Dickson and a blue line indicating the Southern border according to Lorimer 'with which good of India Office'.
